title: Name
description: Arbitrary/Meaningful का नाम the Export Rule

title: Export Previous Entity
description: निर्दिष्ट करता है if the previous Entity of a replaced Instance shall be also exported.

title: Time नियम
description: लागू करें this rule only within specified time ranges.

title: Export Delay
description: Delay export of entities to accumulate multiple trigger events to one export task.

title: Export Reoccurred Instances
description: Indicates if the entity shall be exported on subsequent occurrence of instances
